Translations.Text: Does he not realize that when what are in the graves are scattered
And what is in the chests is gathered
That their Lord has been fully aware of them
The Shocker
What is the Shocker
And how would you know what the Shocker is
The Day when people come out like swarms of butterflies
And the mountains will be like fluffed up wool
As for him whose weights are heavy
He will be in a happy life
As for him whose weights are light
His destiny is the lowest
And how would you know what it is
A blazing Fire
Hoarding has distracted you
Until you visit the graves
No, you will find out
Then again, you will find out
No, if only you had the knowledge of certainty
You would then see Hell
Then you would see it with the eye of certainty
Then you would be questioned, on that Day, about the blessings
By time
Man is indeed in loss
Except those who believe, and do good works, and support one another with the truth, and support one another with perseverance
Woe to every backbiter, slanderer
Who gathered his wealth and counted it
He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal
Never! He will be thrown into the Destroyer
And do you know what is the Destroyer
The kindled Fire of God
Which reaches the inside of the hearts
It will confine them therein
In extended columns
Have you not seen what your Lord did to the people of the elephant
Did He not cause their plans to go astray
And He sent upon them mighty flying creatures
Striking them with fiery projectiles
Until He made them like chewed up hay
This should be cherished by Quraysh
The way they cherish the journey of the winter and summer
So let them serve the Lord of this Sanctuary
The One who fed them from hunger, and protected them from fear
Have you seen he who is denying in the system
It is the one who mistreats the orphan
And the one who does not encourage the feeding of the poor
So woe to those who make the contact prayer
Who are towards their contact prayer absent minded
They only want to be seen
And they withhold from any assistance
We have given you plenty
Therefore, you shall make contact to your Lord and sacrifice
Indeed your rival will be the loser
Say: "O rejecters
I do not serve what you serve
Nor do you serve what I serve
Nor will I serve what you serve
Nor will you serve what I serve
To you is your system, and to me is mine
When the victory of God and conquest comes
And you see the people entering into the system of God in flocks
You shall glorify the grace of your Lord, and seek His forgiveness; for He is the Redeemer
Condemned are the hands of the fire maker; condemned
His money will not avail him, nor what he has earned
He will be sent to a flaming fire
And his wife who carries the logs
On her neck will be a rope of thorns
Say: "He is God, the One
God, the Indivisible
He does not beget, nor was He begotten
And there is none who is His equal
Say: "I seek refuge with the Lord of the rising dawn
From the evil among His creation
And from the evil of murkiness as it falls
And from the evil of those who blow on knots
And from the evil of an envier when he envies
Say: "I seek refuge with the Lord of the people
The King of the people
The god of the people
From the evil of the sneaking whisperer
Who whispers into the chests of the people
From the Jinn and the people
